name: Cardfeteria
description:
Get cozy and matching on this cozy card-matching game.

Use "-" and "=" to adjust camera size. 

Left click to interact with the environment. Left click to de-select cards. Click on the containers on the right to draw ingredients. Match ingredients to make drinks. E.g. putting coffee powder on a water cup makes black coffee. Click on the trash can on the left to remove a card. You can serve drinks to the patron by clicking on him with a card selected.

Press Escape at any point to leave.

Have fun. :)
